title: Name change bug
body: I renamed as Lokes this post is from Lokes but in right top corner is showing me my old name teplybazant. What can I do? Sites like lolskill.net can't find me because my name is bugged into teplybazant name. Can riot fix this or what ? What can I do I cant use sites like lolskill how much time I wasted on lol and a lot more. Could someone help me? Or can I refund name and try again. Or just wait for riot fix ?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

There's usually a bit of lag time on the boards when changing your name. I'd assume this is the same case with 3rd party sites like lolskill, but that's not something we have control over, so I can't speak to that.
